attributes.action: Deny David Cameron £10m for private plane when the country is in austerity
attributes.additional_details:
NHS being stripped of funding
Police being stripped of funding
Fire & rescue stripped of funding
Councils being stripped of funding
Welfare stripped of funding

We are all being told there is no money, yet government thinks it's ok to spend £10m on a private "airforce 1" for the PM 

That £10m and it's running costs thereafter could be better spent on the above services
attributes.background: David Cameron wants a plane to jet around the world on government business, the U.K. Simply cannot afford £10m on a plane for the PM especially when this government is taking so much from poorest in society, this must not be allowed to happen.
